name: FolcDark
description:
FolcDark is a prologue of a third-person dark fantasy action-adventure game, with a story and characters focused on Brazilian folklore.



You are looking for your sister, and you have a saci captured in a bottle that gives you skills to use hurricanes to defeat your enemies and cross the obstacles of this world, the 2 characters are in a nightmare that was created by Tupã and the other gods ancients to imprison beings who broke their rules.



Skills: In addition to hurricanes and teleports, you will have Iara's tears and Victoria Régia's tears
Enemies: This world is full of creatures like hairy hands, caruaras, drybodies, capelobos, bradadores, Mapinguaris and more.
Mounting: The Headless Mule is present here as well.
